availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: R. V. Wheeler (Boyle County, Kentucky, photographer)

body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, photographer. Kentucky native. Artist in Boyle County in 1863. Photographer in Danville, Boyle County, in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Boyle County, KY, August 1863, p. 343 / 370 on microfilm (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 06, Boyle County, Kentucky, 1864 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
